info.name: Spinal cord, anterior horn
info.description: The anterior horn of the spinal cord is AKA ventral horn of the spinal cord. Major division of the spinal cord gray matter that contains the lower motor neurons (aka anterior horn cells) that innervate the skeletal muscles of the body. These lower motor neurons include alpha motor neurons that innervate extrafusal muscle fibers and gamma motor neurons that innervate the intrafusal fibers of the muscle spindles.
